ygData.subject: Re: resistance after patch
ygData.msgSnippet: At 02:14 PM 7/2/99 +1000, you wrote: I always do, this was in spite of tashani. ... -- Silverlock,  ICQ 474725 Household Pests?  The SW-404 SpitFire APRL
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:14 PM 7/2/99 +1000, you wrote:

I always do, this was in spite of tashani.

>use the tashan or tashani type spells to lower magic resist.
>
>Tim Borelli wrote:
>
>> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>>
>> did anyone else notice a lot of resisted spells after the patch while
>> playing last night? i certainly did... green aviaks were resisting ALL of
>> my spells, so i left ther and went to permafrost, and i got a bunch of
>> resists (at the wrong time, when else =)) there as well.
>>
>> just wondering if i was just having bad luck last night...
>>
>> Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 25th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
--
Silverlock, ICQ 474725

Household Pests? The SW-404 'SpitFire' APRL cleansing system
will remove them, we Guarantee IT! Not responsible for damage
to persons or structures from use of this product.
Dial 1-800-FRY-THEM for info and a home demonstration.
